rComments: Don't think she had any experience at all. Clearly didn't know what she was talking about. Complately confused. Seems like a well-meaning person though. But honestly, shouldn't be teaching. The class is really easy though. Got a C without even trying. However, if your'e serious about the subject matter, take this with a more experienced professor.

I really enjoyed this section.  Discussions were productive and useful and Allison really helped aid my understanding of the subject matter.  She's very enthusiastic about psychology and has a real desire to help people improve their life.

Just doesn't seem to know what she's doing. Instructions were always unclear. Her approach to psychology was quite rediculous. Didn't seem to have a good grasp over the subjects and clearly inexperienced. Easy class though.

Probably one of the easier core teachers. Can't really blame her for the assignments because she didn't write them, the provost did. As long as you listen to her comments on your essays, and revise them, your grade will improve. Pretty much, core sucks, but it's not her fault becuase she's not in charge.
She is really tuff.  I got a no pass for all my essays but when i revised it, i received a c-.  Her comments are harsh to hear and she does not give suggestions on how to improve students essays.

She seems not to know what she is to be teaching. Most of the time you will be wondering "Wait, so what's the assignment?" She does not guide you through writing effective essays, instead she just provides you with the assignments. It is expected that you do the essays on your own and pass, maybe with the help of a writing asistant you pay for
